title: Waistcoat, 1775–90
medium:
Medium: silk, linen
Technique: Front: embroidery in satin, stem and knot stitches using 33 different silk yarns on silk 7&1 satin; appliqué of silk woven fabric. Back: linen plain weave.
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Gentleman's waistcoat with embroidered design of leaves and urns pouring water.

tombstone.epitaph:
Waistcoat, 1775–90.
1775–90. Medium: silk, linen
Technique: Front: embroidery in satin, stem and knot stitches using 33 different silk yarns on silk 7&1 satin; appliqué of silk woven fabric. Back: linen plain weave.. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-54-34.
